00002 #include <stdio.h>

00005 void initializePciDevice(pci_device active_dev)
00006 {
00007         unsigned char class = pciDeviceGetClass(active_dev);
00008         unsigned char subclass = pciDeviceGetSubclass(active_dev);
00009 
00010         switch (class)
00011         {
00012 
00013                 case CLASS_TYPE_MASS_STORAGE:
00014                 {
00015                         //Mass storage device, iterate through the possibles
00016                         switch (subclass)
00017                         {
00018                                 case MASS_STORAGE_TYPE_IDE:
00019                                 {
00020                                         printf("IDE controller found, being initialized\n");
00021                                         printf("Vendor 0x%x\n", pciDeviceGetVendor(active_dev));
00022                                         printf("ID 0x%x\n", pciDeviceGetDeviceId(active_dev));
00023                                         printf("Bus %x slot %x function %x\n", active_dev.bus, active_dev.slot, active_dev.function);
00024                                         printf("Bar0 0x%x Bar1 0x%x Bar2 0x%x Bar3 0x%x\n", pciDeviceGetBar0(active_dev), pciDeviceGetBar1(active_dev), pciDeviceGetBar2(active_dev), pciDeviceGetBar3(active_dev));
00025 
00026                                         unsigned long primary_channel_io = 0, secondary_channel_io = 0, primary_channel_ctrl = 0, secondary_channel_ctrl = 0;
00027 
00028                                         if (pciDeviceGetBar0(active_dev) == 0x0 || pciDeviceGetBar0(active_dev) == 0x1)
00029                                         {
00030                                                 primary_channel_io = 0x1F0;
00031                                         }
00032 
00033                                         if (pciDeviceGetBar1(active_dev) == 0x0 || pciDeviceGetBar1(active_dev) == 0x1)
00034                                         {
00035                                                 primary_channel_ctrl = 0x3F4;
00036                                         }
00037 
00038                                         if (pciDeviceGetBar2(active_dev) == 0x0 || pciDeviceGetBar0(active_dev) == 0x1)
00039                                         {
00040                                                 secondary_channel_io = 0x170;
00041                                         }
00042 
00043                                         if (pciDeviceGetBar3(active_dev) == 0x0 || pciDeviceGetBar0(active_dev) == 0x1)
00044                                         {
00045                                                 secondary_channel_ctrl = 0x37F;
00046                                         }
00047 
00048                                         initializeIdeHardDrive(primary_channel_io, primary_channel_ctrl, secondary_channel_io, secondary_channel_ctrl); 
00049 
00050                                         break;
00051                                 };
00052 
00053                                 default:
00054                                 {
00055                                         printf("Unhandled mass storage device\n");
00056                                         //Unhandled storage device
00057                                         break;
00058                                 };
00059                         };
00060                 };
00061 
00062                 default:
00063                 {
00064                         //Unhandled device
00065                         break;
00066                 };
00067         }
00068 }

00070 void initializeDevices()
00071 {
00072 
00073         printf("Scanning PCI bus\n");
00074 
00075         pci_device Dev;
00076         Dev.bus = 0;
00077         Dev.slot = 0;
00078 
00079         unsigned int busi = 0;
00080         unsigned int sloti = 0;
00081         unsigned int functioni = 0;
00082         unsigned int ndev = 0;
00083 
00084 
00085         for (busi = 0; busi < 255; busi++)
00086         {
00087                 for (sloti = 0; sloti < 255; sloti++)
00088                 {
00089                         Dev.bus = busi;
00090                         Dev.slot = sloti;
00091                         Dev.function = 0;
00092 
00093                         if (pciDeviceExists(Dev))
00094                         {
00095                                 if (pciDeviceGetHeaderType(Dev) == 0x80)
00096                                 {
00097 
00098                                         for (functioni = 0; functioni < 3; functioni++)
00099                                         {
00100                                                 Dev.function = functioni;
00101                                                 initializePciDevice(Dev);
00102                                                 ndev++;
00103                                         }
00104 
00105                                 } else
00106                                 {
00107                                         initializePciDevice(Dev);
00108                                         ndev++;                                 
00109                                 }
00110                         
00111                         }
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 sloti = 0;
00115         }
00116 
00117         printf("%i devices found\n", ndev);
00118 }
